header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Phones, Food, Accident anecdotes , War stories, Travel, ANON’s grandmother, Boxing, ANON’s father, The end of WWII, Neighbours, Opera, Local events Chess The weather
header.activity: Grandfather and granddaughter telling anecdotes and talking about past events

speaker.fls: Spanish -- level unspecified; Japanese -- level unspecified
